mapper.select: SELECT t.*, a.name name, p.name project_name FROM task t, account a, PROJECT p WHERE t.account_id = a.id AND t.PROJECT_ID = p.ID ORDER BY t.id desc
SELECT t.*, a.name name, p.name project_name FROM task t, account a, PROJECT p WHERE t.account_id = a.id AND t.PROJECT_ID = p.ID AND t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TASK SET project_id = #{project_id}, account_id = #{account_id}, subject = #{subject}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, priority = #{priority}, start_date = #{start_date}, due_date = #{due_date}, estimated = #{estimated}, done_ratio = #{done_ratio}, tracker = #{tracker} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TASK WHERE ID in ( SELECT ID FROM TASK START WITH ID=#{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = PARENT_ID )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.parent_id groupId, t.subject title, a.name, t.description content, t.start_date start1, t.due_date end1, t.tracker, t.backgroundColor FROM task t, account a, project p WHERE t.PROJECT_ID = p.ID AND t.ACCOUNT_ID = a.ID
SELECT T.ID, T.SUBJECT, A.NAME, T.DUE_DATE, T.COMPLETED_ON FROM TASK T, ACCOUNT A WHERE T.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND T.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ID AND STATUS = '완료' ORDER BY COMPLETED_ON DESC
